title: The Lincoln Center International Choral Festival
creator_credit: James R. Bjorge, Nathan Kroll, Lincoln Center for Performing Arts and Phoenix Films
brief_description: Sixteen choral groups from universities all over the world gather at the Lincoln Center, New York, for the 3rd International Choral Festival.
